trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You typically use the ContentPresenter in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用在 ContentPresenter<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>來指定要加入的內容的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a ContentPresenter in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>型別具有在其預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> ContentPresenter</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When a ContentPresenter object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: 當 ContentPresenter 物件處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性來取得其值之屬性的相同名稱的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can have the ContentPresenter property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從樣板化的父代的其他屬性中取得這些屬性的值，藉由設定 ContentPresenter 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>屬性或繫結到它們。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ContentPresenter uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: ContentPresenter 使用下列邏輯來顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>:-如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>上 ContentPresenter 的屬性設定，ContentPresenter 適用於的<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>屬性與產生的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>物件，請參閱[資料範本化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>上 ContentPresenter 的屬性設定，ContentPresenter 適用於適當<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>屬性與產生的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果有<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>相關聯的型別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>，ContentPresenter 適用於的<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>屬性與產生的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>並顯示其子項目，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>隨即出現。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>已經有父代，發生例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -如果有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>將轉換的型別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，ContentPresenter 會使用該<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>與產生的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>隨即出現。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: -如果有<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>將轉換的型別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>為字串，ContentPresenter 會使用該<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>並建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>包含該字串。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>隨即出現。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: - If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: -如果內容<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>、 <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>顯示屬性</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>的值</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: - The ContentPresenter calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -ContentPresenter 呼叫的<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>，並建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>包含<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>所傳回的字串</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A></xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>隨即出現。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 放置在單一子項目，並且判斷內容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: 大小這個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>物件應該用來排列其子元素。

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目所需的實際大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: 傳回要使用的範本。

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: 這可能取決於內容或其他內容。

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules: 1.
trans-unit.target: 基底類別會實作以下規則︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>設定中使用它。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>設定時，呼叫其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果結果不是`null`，使用它。

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: 尋找<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>其<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>符合已知的資源之間的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>（包括應用程式、 主題和系統資源）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到一個物件，使用它。

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>是 「 通用 」，使用標準範本。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 常見的類型為`String`， <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>，和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，請使用基本上會將轉換的預設範本<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>為字串，並顯示於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以覆寫這些規則，並實作其本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來產生之子項目的資料<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，它會自動顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的樣板化控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，如果您<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>的程式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>以隱含方式繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>而且使用該<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>的內容屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>設定

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>屬性，您可能要考慮使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>屬性會指向樣板化的父代，以及別名的屬性相關聯的範本和範本選擇器內容自動。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用量通常使用`TemplateBinding`繫結此屬性值為樣板化控制項上的值。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: 用來產生的子元素的資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在自動別名期間使用的基底名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: 只能為這個屬性時使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>範本中。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with ContentSource set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 當範本包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>ContentSource 設定為使用"`Abc`"，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>的別名是自動`Abc`， `AbcTemplate`，和`AbcTemplateSelector`分別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting ContentSource to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]，設為 ContentSource"`Abc`」 也會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>屬性的別名`AbcStringFormat`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: 最有用的兩個值，這個屬性為 「 內容 」 和 「 標頭 」。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: 要自動別名期間使用的基底名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: 預設為 「 內容 」。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，則會忽略 ContentStringFormat 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為**true**|None |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>屬性就會顯示為字串，如果。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示控制項的內容的範本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref>定義內容的視覺效果。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>，可讓應用程式寫入器提供自訂邏輯，選擇用來顯示控制項的內容的範本。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性就會忽略<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字使用對於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that supplies logic to return a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>物件，提供邏輯，以傳回<xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>套用。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: 決定的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>物件根據調整大小屬性、 邊界和要求的子內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值不應該超過上限值。

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: 排列子內容所需大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property on instances of this class.
